es.situm.sdk.calibration

Interface CalibrationListener


  • public interface CalibrationListener
    Listener for the calibration process.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onBleScanned(int numBles)
      Nofify the number of BLEs scanned
      void onDistanceCalibratedUpdate(float meters)
      Notify the session calibration distance
      void onError(ErrorCode code)
      Notifies that there is a problem during the calibration.
      void onPedometerSpeedUpdate(float metersPerSecond)
      (EXPERIMENTAL) Notify the speed of the calibration provided by the pedometer
      void onSpeedUpdate(float metersPerSecond)
      (EXPERIMENTAL) Notify the speed of the calibration calculated between two ground truth points
      void onWifiScanned(int numWifis)
      Notify the number of WiFis scanned

      • onError

        void onError(ErrorCode code)
        Notifies that there is a problem during the calibration. If this method is triggered the calibration will be canceled
        Parameters:
        code - see ErrorCode
